title: Under the Strictly Glitterball with Michelle Visage: 'You must take whatever joy you can in life. If that’s Kelvin’s hips, then let it be'
text:
The RuPaul Drag Race judge talks hip action, Dev's shock exit and the emotion of the rumba

Well that was a crazy week! Last Sunday was absolutely mental. I still can't believe that happened. It was so shocking to see Dev depart in the dance-off. It just goes to show that no one is safe in this competition, even if they are a great dancer. Seriously, if you have a favourite then you must vote because at this point, it’s anyone’s game and everyone is raising the stakes.

For me, I always strive to be better than I was last week and never feel safe. Ever. I was left on those steps until the very end during Sunday’s results show and it’s such a sinking feeling. I really love being a part of this show...
description: The RuPaul Drag Race judge talks hip action, Dev's shock exit and the emotion of the rumba
